rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明 G6PD 缺乏与 ADHD 风险增加和兴奋剂药物使用增加有关葡萄糖 6-磷酸脱氢酶 (G6PD) 缺陷个体患注意力缺陷/多动症 (ADHD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-reveals-G6PD-deficiency-linked-to-higher-ADHD-risk-and-increased-use-of-stimulant-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-reveals-G6PD-deficiency-linked-to-higher-ADHD-risk-and-increased-use-of-stimulant-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a554f05e-55b2-4d93-a215-655d2c32a81d Fri, 01 Dec 2023 05:14:00 -0500 Study reveals G6PD deficiency linked to higher ADHD risk and increased use of stimulant medications
疟疾检测领域取得突破：全新 FREM 平台可实现 98% 的快速筛查和基因分型准确率用于疟疾筛查和疟原虫物种基因分型的灵活、稳健、免设备的微流体 (FREM) 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Breakthrough-in-Malaria-detection-new-FREM-platform-delivers-9825-accuracy-for-rapid-screening-and-genotyping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Breakthrough-in-Malaria-detection-new-FREM-platform-delivers-9825-accuracy-for-rapid-screening-and-genotyping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff6752ce-522e-40fa-a814-d66f8234e7c3 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 04:50:00 -0500 Breakthrough in Malaria detection: new FREM platform delivers 98% accuracy for rapid screening and genotyping
社交媒体帖子会对心理健康治疗的看法产生负面影响研究表明社交媒体会对人们的心理健康产生负面影响。但这会影响人们对心理健康治疗的信念吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Social-media-posts-can-negatively-impact-perceptions-of-mental-health-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Social-media-posts-can-negatively-impact-perceptions-of-mental-health-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69c98200-325a-40a7-8a3f-c51d7be3b9b6 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 23:36:49 -0500 Social media posts can negatively impact perceptions of mental health treatment
研究表明衰老如何影响皮肤细胞之间的通讯一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 22 期封面上，题为“Chronological Ageing Impacts丰富性，人表皮角质形成细胞产生的细胞外囊泡的功能和microRNA含量。" https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-shows-how-aging-affects-communication- Between-skin-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-shows-how-aging-affects-communication- Between-skin-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7d1bb51-5783-45cd-9a51-c4387638d2b8 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 23:19:31 -0500 Study shows how aging affects communication between skin cells
沉默半乳糖凝集素1蛋白可缩小小鼠肝癌肿瘤加州大学戴维斯分校综合癌症中心的研究人员表明，使用基因疗法抑制特定蛋白质可以缩小小鼠的肝细胞癌（HCC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Silencing-galectin-1- Protein-shrinks-liver-cancer-tumors-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Silencing-galectin-1- Protein-shrinks-liver-cancer-tumors-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21f7904f-26f2-49de-89f4-98d71f6cc037 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 23:01:32 -0500 Silencing galectin 1 protein shrinks liver cancer tumors in mice
研究发现长期新冠症状会随着时间的推移而波动，这对治疗方法提出了挑战研究表明，超过一半的长期新冠患者的症状严重程度会随着时间的推移而波动，这凸显了病情的动态性质。考虑到长期新冠病例的这些症状变化，该研究强调了适应性医疗干预和自我管理策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-finds-long-COVID-symptoms-fluctuate-over-time-challenging-treatment-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-finds-long-COVID-symptoms-fluctuate-over-time-challenging-treatment-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c327d910-1e0e-4219-bdde-da5278d8ca32 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 22:58:00 -0500 Study finds long-COVID symptoms fluctuate over time, challenging treatment approaches
海军豆可以改善结直肠癌幸存者的肠道健康和新陈代谢根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的最新研究，将海军豆纳入结直肠癌 (CRC) 幸存者的饮食中，有可能通过调节与肥胖和疾病相关的标记物，对肠道和宿主健康产生积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Navy-beans-may-improve-gut-health-and-metabolism-in-colorectal-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Navy-beans-may-improve-gut-health-and-metabolism-in-colorectal-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03dad177-5a79-43b4-a985-d589e582a142 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 22:50:07 -0500 Navy beans may improve gut health and metabolism in colorectal cancer survivors
探索“食物噪音”：研究揭示饮食观念和肥胖治疗突破研究深入探讨了“食物噪音”的概念，即关于饮食的持续想法，并评估了其对饮食行为和肥胖治疗的影响。它探讨了 GLP-1RA（一类用于体重管理的药物）如何影响食物提示反应，可能为肥胖治疗和饮食行为的心理方面提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Exploring-food-noise-Study-sheds-light-on-eating-thoughts-and-obesity-treatment-breakthroughs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Exploring-food-noise-Study-sheds-light-on-eating-thoughts-and-obesity-treatment-breakthroughs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b828695a-1b29-4e63-bbe6-852f155e59a3 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 22:38:00 -0500 Exploring 'food noise': Study sheds light on eating thoughts and obesity treatment breakthroughs
机器学习模型根据神经生物标志物预测大脑健康状况的改善作为不断追求改善大脑健康和表现的一部分，德克萨斯大学达拉斯分校大脑健康中心领导的新研究调查了与大脑健康指数改善相关的神经生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Machine-learning-model-predicts-brain-health-improvements-based-on-neural-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Machine-learning-model-predicts-brain-health-improvements-based-on-neural-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15ff6880-88f4-4877-94d7-8e0a0f8f186f Thu, 30 Nov 2023 22:11:32 -0500 Machine learning model predicts brain health improvements based on neural biomarkers
在英国，更严格地遵守基于生活方式的建议可降低患癌症的风险BMC Medicine 研究证实，遵守 2018 年世界癌症研究基金/美国癌症研究所的建议可显着降低英国人群患各种癌症的风险，包括乳腺癌、结直肠癌和食道癌。这凸显了生活方式选择在癌症预防中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Greater-adherence-to-lifestyle-based-recommendations-reduced-the-risk-of-cancers-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Greater-adherence-to-lifestyle-based-recommendations-reduced-the-risk-of-cancers-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1475935d-85b6-40d9-a25d-311ee187f57e Thu, 30 Nov 2023 22:08:00 -0500 Greater adherence to lifestyle-based recommendations reduced the risk of cancers in the U.K.
